modal.title: Spread this project around the world
modal.description: You can copy the link to send it and also share it on Facebook or Twitter. You can even copy a code snippet to embed a campaign banner on another website. Make it reach even further!

page.title: Tell us your personal data
page.description: We need to know who you are before paying.

welcome.title: Welcome to the new Goteo.
welcome.subtitle: We're embarking on a new phase and we want to share it with you from the beginning. The platform will grow gradually: we'll activate sections and features as they're ready and validated by our community. For now, you can log in with your same email and password and explore the project archive. Thank you for joining us on this journey.

error.cookieNotFound: Session cookie has not been found.

error.not-found: The date of completion of the campaign has not been found.

rewards.title: Select your rewards

donation-free.title: I give up an individual reward, I just want to help the project
donation-free.description: In this space you can donate the amount you consider without obtaining reward in return.

rewards.reward-iva-message: Remember that each contribution has a tax relief between 35 and 80%! {{link}}
rewards.error-invalid-amount: Please enter a valid amount greater than or equal to the amount of the reward

hero.title: Fund the change the world needs
hero.description: We're embarking on a new era with the same vision that has guided us from the beginning: promoting projects that transform the world through social justice, democratic participation, and the defense of human rights and ecosystems. Join a community that transforms realities. Be part of the solution!

renovationBanner.title: We're renewing Goteo!
renovationBanner.description: Goteo has built a unique history in the world of crowdfunding. Do you want to continue being a part of it?

checkout.title: Summary of your selected donations
checkout.subtitle: We show you the ones you have selected, press the "Continue" button to pay.

reward.claimed: people have already claimed this reward
reward.unclaimed: No one has claimed this reward.

contributions.description: Here you'll find the latest campaign contributions, which you can sort and filter as you wish.

blog.title: Big changes are coming… don't miss anything!
blog.excerpt: A process that involves a significant technical migration from the current platform, and to do so with all the security guarantees and without loss of information, we need to carry out an orderly transition, with key dates for publishing campaigns and making donations…

matchfunding.title: Matchfunding
matchfunding.description: You'll only see the match effect with Goteo. Since 2013, we've been looking for organizations that want to multiply the impact of crowdfunding. For every euro a person contributes to a Goteo campaign, a collaborating institution (foundation, public administration, company…) contributes the same amount, or even more.

impact.title: Impact data
impact.description: Matchfunding not only multiplies financial resources, but also generates a tangible social impact. In essence, matchfunding transforms microdonations into macroimpact, validating projects with citizen support and optimizing public and private resources.

cards.viewCampaigns: See the campaigns of the call

theoryToAction.title: From theory to action
theoryToAction.subtitle: The numbers that reveal our footprint. Updated data for 2024.

whyGoteo.title: Why Drip?
whyGoteo.subtitle: We have values, and the data supports us. Data updated for 2024.

averageDonors.label: Average number of donors per project

stories.title: Goteo launches new website!
stories.subtitle: Glad to share it with you.
stories.description:
Goteo has a new look! Browse our revamped website and discover a more intuitive and engaging social crowdfunding experience. Explore innovative projects, meet the creators behind them, and join our community.
Become a donor and make your ideas a reality!

firstCampaign.title: How do I run my first campaign?
firstCampaign.description: Your project deserves to take off: Master social crowdfunding with our FREE TOOLBOX. A practical guide + downloadable templates to win over your audience.

testimonials.title: Testimonials from our promoters
testimonials.description: Who better to tell you what it's like to promote successful campaigns? Our promoters tell us firsthand what it's like to manage a campaign with Goteo.

profile.userIntro: Active member of the Goteo community
profile.bioSample: With a trajectory dedicated to the crowdfunding and collective financing ecosystem, {{name}} has established themselves as a reference in creating collaborative projects and mobilizing resources. Their vision focuses on empowering initiatives that transform local realities, combining innovative strategies with a deep commitment to citizen participation and social equity.

fan.title: Fan
fan.description: This donor has invested more than 25€
